data.script:
<script>
    import {Box, Mosaic} from "@kahi-ui/framework";
</script>

<Mosaic
    class="mosaic-preview"
    sizing="tiny"
    spacing="medium"
>
    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />

    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />

    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />
    <Box palette="affirmative" />

    <Box palette="affirmative" />
    <Box palette="negative" />
    <Box palette="alert" />
</Mosaic>

<style>
    :global(.mosaic-preview .box) {
        height: 3rem;
    }
</style>
data.title: Mosaic Preview
